p: Only completed questionnaires were analyzed. We did not measure the time respondents spent answering the questions; all completed questionnaires were used in our analysis. No statistical correction methods were applied to either the baseline or the follow-up samples. Summary statistics of respondent characteristics can be found in S4 Text. Our sample was broadly similar to the US as a whole, with the exception of education: a significantly higher share of our respondents had a bachelorâ€™s degree or higher [ 18].
